modmenu.descriptionTranslation.anchormac: Anchor Macro + Combat Module Pack by REXYKILLER441 — Automate anchors, combat, and survival features easily!
anchormacro.title: Anchor Macro Settings
anchormacro.tooltip.anchor_macro: Automatically places, charges, and detonates respawn anchors.
anchormacro.tooltip.auto_totem: Automatically replaces empty offhand or main hand slot with a totem after pop.
anchormacro.tooltip.totem_hit: When holding a totem, hitting enemies knocks them back like a sword.
anchormacro.tooltip.hitbox: Expands hitboxes of entities (players, mobs, crystals) for visibility or testing.
anchormacro.dev.note: This mod integrates advanced automation and PvP utilities.
